author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Santam ‍Acquires Remaining 53.37 Pct Stake in Saham Finances S.A For $1.05 Bln
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Santam Ltd:
* ‍ACQUISITION OF INTEREST IN SAHAM FINANCES VIA INDIRECT ACQUISITION OF REMAINING 53.37% SHAREHOLDING NOT OWNED BY SANLAM EMERGING MARKETS IRELAND
* DEAL ‍TOTAL CONSIDERATION PAYABLE IN TERMS OF TRANSACTION IS US$1,050 MILLION​
* WILL FUND CONSIDERATION BY USING A COMBINATION OF AVAILABLE DISCRETIONARY CAPITAL, DEBT FACILITIES AND ISSUANCE OF EQUITY INSTRUMENTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
